name: Inception
descriptions: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

name: Pulp Fiction
descriptions: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Avatar
descriptions: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

name: Jurassic Park
descriptions: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

name: The Departed
descriptions: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
descriptions: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Dark Knight
descriptions: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: Forrest Gump
descriptions: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

name: The Matrix
descriptions: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Goodfellas
descriptions: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
